info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wayne County through 415 PM EDT... At 329 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Taylor, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Romulus around 335 PM EDT. Flat Rock around 355 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Brownstown Township, Gibraltar, New Boston, Riverview, Rockwood, Willow, Woodhaven, Southgate, Waltz and South Rockwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
